heroSection.title: About Sunbrix
heroSection.subtitle: Building dreams with trust, quality, and innovation. We're here to make your home-building journey seamless and stress-free.

storySection.title: Our Story
paragraphs:
It all starts with a dream, a dream searching for freedom, purpose, and a place where you truly belong. A place where imagination takes shape, where memories are built, and where generations feel proud. 
This belief guides everything we do.

We listen, understand, and connect deeply with your vision. Every space is designed and planned with intention, thought, and meaning. Craftsmanship leads our hands. Planned execution, high-quality materials, innovation, transparency and unwavering attention to detail form the principles we build on. These principles have shaped our mastery in creating homes with precision and integrity.

With over 25 years of expertise, we deliver homes built with passion, honesty, and craft. Homes that honour the trust people place in us. Homes that bring your vision to life.

"In India, a home is never just a structure. It is identity, security, and pride. This belief shaped our journey.
For over two decades, we’ve built homes with the same intention and care that a family invests in their dream.
Our mission is simple. We give life to their vision and build homes that honour the trust people place in us."

- Muthamola Chinnaswamy Sridhar Naidu  
Founder - Sunbrix

valuesSection.title: Our Values
valuesSection.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We use only best materials and work with trusted professionals to ensure the highest standards.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear pricing, regular updates, and no hidden surprises. You'll know exactly what to expect at every step.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We leverage technology and construction expertise to deliver better homes, faster and more efficiently.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.description: Your vision drives us. Your dream becomes our responsibility.
